org.mini2Dx.core.collision

Class CollisionPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.gdx.math.Vector2
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Point
        • org.mini2Dx.core.collision.CollisionPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CollisionObject, Positionable, PositionChangeListener<CollisionPoint>, Interpolatable, org.mini2Dx.gdx.math.Vector<org.mini2Dx.gdx.math.Vector2>, org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuadTreeAwareCollisionPoint

    public class CollisionPoint
extends Point
implements CollisionObject, PositionChangeListener<CollisionPoint>
    An implementation of Point that allows for interpolation. Game objects can use this class to move around the game world and retrieve the appropriate rendering coordinates during render phase.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
